_header: When Flora had overfret the firth
_description: A balade — three 8-line stanzas, ababbcbc including refrain ‘Quhom I luf I dar nocht assay’

Banna.First Lines:
Quhen fllora had ourfret þe firthIn may of every moneth
                    quene…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Than evir of grice did fair helenequhome I luve I dar nocht
                    assay
